body.value:
Vital primary care services for the Orcas Island community

UW Medicine has partnered with the Orcas Medical Foundation to operate the Orcas Island Clinic. Our clinic offers comprehensive primary care services and acute illness and injury care for the entire family as well as digital X-ray capabilities, advanced lab testing and a Virtual Clinic kiosk for urgent care needs. We’re proud to ensure that high-quality medical care and information is available to all members of the Orcas Island community.

attributes.title: Fairwood Clinic at Valley Medical Center Renton

body.value:
Family and internal medicine, conveniently located in Renton

Located near the Fairwood Shopping Center in Renton, the Fairwood Clinic offers you and your family the excellent care you deserve, right in your neighborhood. Our board-certified family medicine specialists are dedicated to providing a full spectrum of care, from newborns to senior adults, with preventive medicine as well as acute illness or injury care. Some of the languages our providers speak include Mandarin, Taiwanese, Kikuyu, Swahili, Hindi and Punjabi. We welcome you and your family to come see us.

attributes.title: Cascade Clinic at Valley Medical Center

body.value:
Personalized family medicine in Renton

If you live in Renton, the Cascade Clinic offers comprehensive healthcare services right in your neighborhood.

Located at the Valley Medical Center, we’re open five days a week and it’s our goal that you see your provider when it’s most convenient for you.

Our board-certified primary care physicians are experienced with family medicine, obstetrics, sports medicine and chronic care management.

Some of the additional languages our providers speak include Vietnamese, Ilocano, Tagalog, Hindi, Punjabi and Urdu.

No matter what type of care you and your family need, you’ll get a warm welcome from the dedicated providers at the Cascade Clinic.

We accept most major insurance plans. Make your appointment for primary care services today.

attributes.title: Highlands Clinic at Valley Medical Center Renton

body.value:
Convenience and comprehensive care in Renton

Located between downtown Renton and East Renton Highlands, the Highlands Clinic offers families full-spectrum care five days a week.

Our specialties include family medicine, internal medicine and obstetrics, with an emphasis on preventive care to keep you and your family healthy.

In addition, the Highlands Clinic has providers who also speak Spanish and Romanian. We invite you to come see us. It’s our goal to ensure that you get an appointment on the day you wish to be seen.

We accept most major insurance plans. Make your appointment for primary care services today.

attributes.title: Covington Clinic South at Valley Medical Center

body.value:
Convenient, comprehensive medical care for Covington families

If you’re a Covington resident, you’ll find the Covington Clinic South conveniently located on the rotary near Fred Meyer and Costco.

You’ll find our providers are dedicated to delivering comprehensive family medicine and pediatric care.

We’re a Valley Medical Center primary care clinic, and we also partner with Covington Clinic North to offer specialty care in cardiology, OB/GYN, midwife services, rheumatology and otolaryngology (ear, nose & throat).

And when you need care immediately, our Covington Clinic South | Urgent Care is located in the same building.

We accept most major insurance plans. Make your appointment for primary care services today.

attributes.title: Maternal Fetal Medicine Clinic at Valley

body.value:
Specialized care for expecting mothers with complicated pregnancies

Conveniently located at Valley Medical Center in Renton, the Maternal Fetal Medicine Clinic provides personal and attentive care when you visit us for a pregnancy ultrasound, low- or high-risk perinatology consultation, genetic consulting or other specialized pregnancy services.

We offer healthcare for women and families with special health conditions or challenges that may complicate pregnancy and birth for both mother and baby.

Specialty services including diabetic care during pregnancy, premature birth prevention, care for multiple gestations, and care for complex medical conditions during pregnancy.

We are dedicated to making sure you have the highest level of care possible as you begin your journey to motherhood.

We are dedicated to making sure you have the highest level of care possible as you begin your journey to motherhood.

attributes.title: Northwest Primary Care Main Campus Clinic

body.value:
Comprehensive healthcare in North Seattle

Conveniently located on the Northwest Hospital campus in north Seattle, the Northwest Primary Care Main Campus Clinic offers coordinated primary care for the entire family, from young adults to seniors.

Board-certified primary care physicians offer services including wellness care, management of chronic conditions, treatment of acute conditions, mental health services and routine gynecologic exams. 

Our primary care physicians serve as your health advocates, offering guidance that can help you take an active role in your own self-care.

We accept most major insurance plans. Make your appointment today.
body.processed:
Comprehensive healthcare in North Seattle

Our primary care physicians serve as your health advocates, offering guidance that can help you take an active role in your own self-care.

We accept most major insurance plans. Make your appointment today.

body.value:
Complex gynecology consultation and care in one convenient location

Located within the Women’s Health Clinic at Roosevelt, the Specialty Gynecology Clinic (part of the Women's Health Care Center) provides specialized care for the most complex gynecology concerns, including:

  • Dysplasia and HPV disease, including those requiring colposcopy (or LEEP)
  • Family planning for routine birth control and family planning services for medically complex patients
  • Gynecologic surgery consultation – including robotic and minimally invasive surgery
  • Pediatric and Adolescent Gynecology services
  • Vulvovaginitis

Our providers are specialists in the field of gynecology and are available for initial consultations or second opinions.

Our providers are specialists in the field of gynecology and are available for initial consultations or second opinions.

body.value:
Genetic testing offers pregnant women decision-making guidance

The Prenatal Genetics Clinic at UW Medicine offers women the option to test their fetus for genetic or chromosome abnormalities. The two basic tests include:

  • Screening tests: determine if parents carry genes for inherited disorders. Other blood tests screen the fetus for chromosome problems, Down syndrome and brain and spinal cord defects.
  • Diagnostic tests: confirm screening tests and determine if a baby does or doesn’t have a birth defect using ultrasound, amniocentesis and ancestry screenings.

We partner with patients to help them decide whether to test; what type of tests to conduct and when; and what their options are once test results are known.

body.value:
Personalized, comprehensive care just for women

Conveniently located on the third floor of UW Medical Center, the Women’s Health Clinic provides a full range of obstetrics and gynecology care, from wellness exams to pregnancy care to the latest in minimally invasive surgery.

The experienced physicians and nurse practitioners at the Women’s Health Clinic at UWMC offer a wide array of primary and specialty healthcare services that address the unique health needs of women.

We emphasize wellness and prevention, and encourage you to become a partner in your healthcare. Our goal is to partner with you for a lifetime of health and wellness.

body.value:
Personalized, comprehensive care just for women

The experienced physicians and nurse practitioners at the Women’s Health Clinic at UWMC-Roosevelt offer a wide array of primary and specialty healthcare services that address the unique health needs of women.

We emphasize wellness and prevention, and encourage you to become a partner in your healthcare. Our services include well-woman exams, complete OB/GYN care, help with menopause, mental health services and social work guidance.  We also offer breast care services, including mammography and breast imaging.

We invite women of all ages to come see us. Our goal is to partner with you for a lifetime of health and wellness.

attributes.title: Maternal Fetal Medicine Clinic at UWMC

body.value:
Comprehensive care for expecting mothers with complicated pregnancies

Located at UW Medical Center, the Maternal Fetal Medicine Clinic (formerly Maternal and Infant Care) provides comprehensive pregnancy-related services and ongoing obstetric care for women with health conditions or special challenges that may complicate pregnancy or birth.

Specialty services including diabetic care during pregnancy, premature birth prevention, care for multiple gestations, and care for complex medical conditions during pregnancy. Our team of highly specialized providers cares for the most complicated and highest risk pregnancies in the region.

We are dedicated to making sure you have the highest level of care possible as you begin your journey to motherhood.

We are dedicated to making sure you have the highest level of care possible as you begin your journey to motherhood.

body.value:
Complete care for infants, children and teens

The Children’s Clinic at Harborview (formerly Pediatric Clinic) offers a wide range of services including well-child and sick care, developmental screenings, breastfeeding support, confidential teen services, and mental health services. Same-day appointments are available for sick kids, and a 24-hour nurse phone line is available when you need immediate care assistance.

Specialty services are also available through the Children’s Clinic, including dental screenings, and access to the Foster Care Clinic and the Adolescent Medicine Clinic. In addition we are pleased to provide books for children at every well check-up, and help keep your child safe by providing bicycle helmets and other safety supplies.

We offer interpreter services for non-English speaking families as well as assistance dealing with health insurance paperwork and problems. The Children’s Clinic at Harborview can also make referrals to Harborview’s Community House Calls program to coordinate care for immigrant and refugee families.

body.value:
Specialty and primary care for growing bodies and minds

Providers at the Adolescent Medicine Clinic at Harborview address a range of issues including eating disorders like anorexia, bulimia and disordered eating; gynecological concerns like puberty, menstrual disorders and PCOS; sexually transmitted infections; high-risk youth activities like substance abuse and having multiple sexual partners; chronic headaches or abdominal pain; anxiety and depression; and prescription management.

attributes.title: Fetal Care & Treatment Clinic at UWMC

body.value:
Your resource for prenatal testing, treatment and care

The Fetal Care & Treatment Clinic specializes in comprehensive prenatal screening and fetal diagnostic testing, as well as treatment of certain fetal conditions during pregnancy.

We offer a number of genetic testing options and will help you understand your chances of having a child with health problems, so you can make an informed decision about your pregnancy. Our services include:

  • High-resolution ultrasound, including nuchal translucency measurement and fetal anatomy evaluation
  • Genetic counseling
  • Consultations with high-risk obstetricians and geneticists
  • Amniocentesis
  • Chorionic villus sampling
  • Cell-free DNA aneuploidy screening (such as MaterniT21™ Plus, verify™, and Harmony™ tests)
  • Integrated screening
  • Fetal echocardiogram
  • Fetal MRI
  • Pre-implantation genetic diagnosis (in partnership with the Fertility Clinic at Roosevelt)
  • In utero fetal blood transfusions
  • EXIT (ex utero intrapartum treatment) procedures for fetal airway obstructive condition
  • Treatment of fetal cardiac arrhythmias

We coordinate pregnancy care for women whose babies need to be delivered by high-risk specialists, and partner with Seattle Children’s Hospital to provide well-coordinated treatment for your baby throughout pregnancy and beyond.

attributes.title: Respite Program at Jefferson Terrace (Edward Thomas House)
Maternal Fetal Medicine and Prenatal Diagnosis Clinic at Valley
AIDS Clinical Trials Unit at Harborview
Center on Human Development and Disability (CHDD) at UWMC

body.value:
A range of primary care services, in the heart of Fremont

Fremont is known as “The Center of the Universe,” so what better place to have a primary care clinic for families at any stage of life? The Northwest Primary Care Fremont Clinic, open five days a week, offers comprehensive, coordinated care that ranges from wellness and preventive care to managing acute and chronic issues. Our clinic’s physicians believe in partnering with you to take charge of your own healthcare — staying healthy and preventing disease from developing in the first place. Your good health is our goal.

The care team accepts most major insurance plans. Make your appointment today.

body.value:
Urinary tract care at Harborview

The Urology Clinic at Harborview Medical Center's Norm Maleng Building provides a wide variety of care and services to adults with problems of the urinary tract, including acute and chronic urinary incontinence, bladder dysfunction, kidney stones and related conditions.

We specialize in the treatment of bladder, kidney and prostate tumors, erectile dysfunction and trauma follow-up, including urinary tract reconstruction. We also provide evaluation, management and patient education for those needing surgery due to trauma or disease, along with pre- and post-operative education and counseling.
body.processed:
Urinary tract care at Harborview

The Urology Clinic at Harborview Medical Center's Norm Maleng Building provides a wide variety of care and services to adults with problems of the urinary tract, including acute and chronic urinary incontinence, bladder dysfunction, kidney stones and related conditions.

We specialize in the treatment of bladder, kidney and prostate tumors, erectile dysfunction and trauma follow-up, including urinary tract reconstruction. We also provide evaluation, management and patient education for those needing surgery due to trauma or disease, along with pre- and post-operative education and counseling.

body.value:
Complete urology care at UW Medical Center

The Urology Clinic at UW Medical Center diagnoses and treats a variety of urologic problems. The facility includes two multidisciplinary clinics—the Prostate Oncology Center and the Urogynecology Clinic—a general urology clinic and a variety of specialized urology clinics.

The general urology clinic is for patients with problems involving urinary voiding infection and urologic pain. Specialized clinics include a stone clinic, a cancer clinic for patients with kidney, bladder and testis/penis cancer, an infertility clinic and a clinic for sexual problems, including erectile dysfunction.
body.processed:
Complete urology care at UW Medical Center

The general urology clinic is for patients with problems involving urinary voiding infection and urologic pain. Specialized clinics include a stone clinic, a cancer clinic for patients with kidney, bladder and testis/penis cancer, an infertility clinic and a clinic for sexual problems, including erectile dysfunction.

body.value:
The Neuroscience Institute at Valley Medical Center provides regional, pioneering care in the field of neuroscience, encompassing a vast array of neurological specialties. The Institute’s neurosurgeons, orthopedic surgeons, neurologists, stroke and epilepsy specialists, technicians and neuropsychologist bring decades of nationally renowned study and practice to this education and treatment center.

The Institute’s practitioners diagnose and treat conditions in adults and children affecting the brain, spinal cord and central nervous system. Common disorders include: headache, epilepsy, tremor, sleep disorders, stroke, Alzheimer’s disease, neuropathy, Parkinson’s disease, multiple sclerosis, brain and spinal cord injuries, brain tumors and amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS). The Neuroscience Institute is proud to offer specialized programs focused on specific conditions, allowing for a personalized plan of care for each patient.

These include:

  • Spine
  • Stroke
  • Neurosurgery
  • Neuro Oncology
  • General Neurology
  • Neurophysiology
  • Neuropsychology
  • Epilepsy Center
  • Headache Clinic
  • Pediatric Neurology
  • Diagnostic Imaging
  • Rehabilitation Services

The Neuroscience Institute's exceptional team of neurologists, neurosurgeons, neuropsychologists, spine specialists and rehabilitation specialists are passionate about improving life for patients and providing excellent care.

attributes.title: Cardiology Imaging (Echocardiography, ECG, Nuclear Medicine) at UWMC

body.value:
Complete cardiac diagnostics at UW Medical Center

The UW Medicine Cardiology Imaging and Echocardiography Services at UW Medical Center offers a full complement of cardiac diagnostic imaging tests and procedures. These include echocardiography and electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG) services, CT and MRI imaging services, and nuclear medicine/stress test imaging.
body.processed:
Complete cardiac diagnostics at UW Medical Center

The UW Medicine Cardiology Imaging and Echocardiography Services at UW Medical Center offers a full complement of cardiac diagnostic imaging tests and procedures. These include echocardiography and electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG) services, CT and MRI imaging services, and nuclear medicine/stress test imaging.

attributes.title: Northwest Primary Care Lake Forest Park Clinic

body.value:
Comprehensive care in a convenient Lake Forest Park location

Conveniently located on Bothell Way and open five days a week, the Northwest Primary Care Lake Forest Park Clinic offers comprehensive primary care ranging from preventive medicine to treatment of chronic disease and acute illness.

Affiliated with Northwest Hospital & Medical Center, our board-certified physicians specialize in wellness medicine, women’s health and family planning, newborn and children’s health and osteopathic medicine.

For patients who require lab tests or imaging services, we perform blood draws on site and can help you schedule X-ray, CT and MRI tests at Northwest Hospital or an imaging center of your choice.

We accept most major insurance plans. Make your appointment today.

attributes.title: Northwest Primary Care North Seattle Clinic

body.value:
Exceptional primary care in new Northgate location

Northwest Primary Care North Seattle Clinic, located in the Northgate neighborhood of Seattle, is a primary care clinic with a highly skilled care team for patients aged young adult to senior.

Combining the latest diagnostic technology with skilled expertise, the clinic emphasizes preventive medicine as well as the treatment of acute illnesses and the management of chronic disease such as hypertension, heart disease and respiratory problems. Northwest Primary Care North Seattle also treats illnesses due to hormonal imbalances, infectious diseases, disorders of the digestive system, depression, stress and other mental health-related conditions. It also provides pre-employment, insurance and return-to-work physicals.

When advisable, the care team will refer you to a specialist, but they will remain your primary providers, coordinating your care and making sure your needs are met.

For your convenience, this clinic offers free underground parking, as well as basic laboratory services (blood draws) and bone densitometry testing in-office. It is open five days per week to serve your needs.

In addition to exceptional primary care, this new location offers:

- Family medicine

- Endocrinology

- Hip, knee, elbow and hand care, including hand therapy

- On-site digital X-ray

- On-site lab services

Northwest Primary Care North Seattle Clinic, located in the Northgate neighborhood of Seattle, is a primary care clinic with a highly skilled care team for patients aged young adult to senior.

Combining the latest diagnostic technology with skilled expertise, the clinic emphasizes preventive medicine as well as the treatment of acute illnesses and the management of chronic disease such as hypertension, heart disease and respiratory problems. Northwest Primary Care North Seattle also treats illnesses due to hormonal imbalances, infectious diseases, disorders of the digestive system, depression, stress and other mental health-related conditions. It also provides pre-employment, insurance and return-to-work physicals.

When advisable, the care team will refer you to a specialist, but they will remain your primary providers, coordinating your care and making sure your needs are met.

For your convenience, this clinic offers free underground parking, as well as basic laboratory services (blood draws) and bone densitometry testing in-office. It is open five days per week to serve your needs.

In addition to exceptional primary care, this new location offers:

- Family medicine

- Endocrinology

- Hip, knee, elbow and hand care, including hand therapy

- On-site digital X-ray

- On-site lab services

body.value:
Cutting-edge research, complex retina care and optometry in South Lake Union

The UW Medicine Eye Institute aims to provide the best possible patient care while training the next generation of ophthalmology practitioners and using research to improve patient outcomes.

Our new Retina Center in Seattle’s South Lake Union neighborhood is the first and only facility focused on serving patients with retinal vision loss in the region. It is equipped with state-of-the-art equipment for testing and treating common to complex eye conditions As well as the most relevant and recent clinical research. Through clinical trials, researchers at the Eye Institute will be able to make faster progress in advancing vision-saving research on several fronts, including stem cell therapy, gene therapy and chemical reanimation therapy, all of which may have the potential to slow or halt retinal degeneration in patients.

body.value:
Compassionate care in Belltown

​​Third Avenue Center, located in Belltown, provides acute and primary healthcare for adult patients residing in downtown Seattle.

We place an emphasis on engaging homeless and at-risk patients in primary care. Our mental healthcare professionals provide a range of services including psychiatric consultations, medication management and recommendations for continued psychiatric care. Social workers are available to help patients access additional community services and resources. 

Health education is available for many conditions, either in the clinic or through the Harborview Patient and Family Resource Center. UW Medicine's specialty services and hospitalization are also available to patients if needed.

body.value:
Primary care for downtown residents near Pioneer Square

Conveniently located near downtown Seattle, the Pioneer Square Clinic provides primary healthcare, and treats acute problems for adult patients.

An on-site pharmacy fills prescriptions by clinic providers. Our mental healthcare professionals provide a range of services including psychiatric consultations, medication management and recommendations for continued psychiatric care. Other available services include podiatry, social services, dietician consultations and health education.

UW Medicine's specialty services and hospitalization are available to patients if needed.

The care team accepts most major insurance plans. Make your appointment today.

body.value:
A world of compassionate, personalized care

The unique International Medicine Clinic at Harborview offers high-quality primary and mental healthcare services to adult refugees and immigrants ages 16 and older. The full services of UW Medicine are available for other specialty care needs or hospitalization.

We also offer a Community House Calls program to visit patients at home and make follow-up visits.

We know getting the right care can be confusing, so our patient care coordinators help patients with a variety of issues related to care such as health insurance, making appointments and contacting other agencies.

Our staff speaks a number of additional languages, including Amharic, Cantonese, Chao Jo, Mandarin, Hmong, Khmer, Laotian, Mien, Oromo, Somali, Tigrinya and Vietnamese. Interpreter services are available.

The care team accepts most major insurance plans. Make your appointment today.

attributes.title: Behavioral Health Recovery Case Management Programs at Harborview
Mental Health Intake and Brief Intervention Services Clinic at Harborview
Psychiatry Consultation Service for Outpatient Clinics at Harborview

body.value:
Mental health consultations at Harborview

The Psychiatry Consultation Clinic at Harborview Medical Center in Seattle’s First Hill neighborhood provides psychotherapy and for some patients can provide medication management for common psychiatric conditions in a setting that is separate from the community mental health center.

Case management services are not available in this setting. Care is provided by psychologists, social workers and psychiatric nurse practitioners.
body.processed:
Mental health consultations at Harborview

The Psychiatry Consultation Clinic at Harborview Medical Center in Seattle’s First Hill neighborhood provides psychotherapy and for some patients can provide medication management for common psychiatric conditions in a setting that is separate from the community mental health center.

Case management services are not available in this setting. Care is provided by psychologists, social workers and psychiatric nurse practitioners.

body.value:
Comprehensive diagnostics and treatment for all eye conditions

Located two blocks from the main medical center in Harborview's Ninth & Jefferson Building on First Hill in Seattle, the UW Medicine Eye Institute offers cutting-edge medical and surgical eye care for common to complex conditions and disorders.

Our staff provides comprehensive treatment for people with glaucoma, cataracts, diseases of the retina, cornea, orbit and nerves and age-related eye diseases. We also perform refractive procedures such as LASIK and oculofacial plastic surgery procedures.

Eyes on James is our full-service optical shop in the Ninth & Jefferson building and offers eye exams, specialty glasses and contact lenses.

attributes.title: Liver Care & Transplantation Services at UWMC

body.value:
Complete maternal care at the UW Medical Center

The Maternal Infant Center at UWMC is dedicated to patient- and family-centered care during labor, birth and recovery, providing you with the birth experience you desire.

We offer private, roomy suites for your comfort during and after giving birth, with the amenities you expect.

Should your baby need extra care after birth, you can rest assured that our Level IV neonatal intensive care unit (NICU) is nearby and able to provide all of the special monitoring, treatments and care your baby needs.

We invite you to tour our birth center before choosing where to have your baby.

Should your baby need extra care after birth, you can rest assured that our Level IV neonatal intensive care unit (NICU) is nearby and able to provide all of the special monitoring, treatments and care your baby needs.

We invite you to tour our birth center before choosing where to have your baby.

body.value:
Comprehensive, compassionate family planning services in the U District

Conveniently located in Seattle’s University District, the Family Planning Clinic - part of the Women’s Health Center at Roosevelt - offers personalized care in a respectful, supportive and friendly environment.

We provide comprehensive family planning services for women who seek birth control options, elective abortion, treatment for miscarriage or fetal demise and surgical sterilization.

We also offer expert advice to women with medical complications who seek family planning advice. Above all, we maintain strict confidentiality regarding the services you are accessing.
